                  How to use the Driver application

                  1. A short summary of How to use
                  2. How to use the Driver application
                  3. Description of the “List of restaurants”
                  4. Description of the “Accept/Decline the delivery”
                  5. Description of the “List of deliveries”
                  6. Description of the “List of meals”
                  7. Description of the “Order on the map”

                  A short summary of How to use

                  1. Login into the application
                  2. Wait, until the newly assigned delivery will get into the device.
                  3. chevron_left Decline or chevron_right Accept the delivery
                  4. Collect all meals for all orders for the delivery. Start the delivery
                  5. Drive at the customer, deliver the meals to the customer, Arrive at customer > Finish the order. If an issue, redo Skip or cancel Cancel the order.
                  6. Add attach_money tips and gesture customers signature, if it’s allowed
                  7. Deliver all orders and return to the store or start to deliver another delivery

                  How to use the Driver application

                  • once the courier will log into the Driver application, he needs to select, if he is in the store or on the way. Once, he will select one of the options, his status will be updated in the DMS, POS and KDS application and he will be ready to accept assigned deliveries.



                  • the List of deliveries screen will be displayed, reloaded with the latest data. The courier needs to wait, until the manager or the dispatcher will assign him the delivery with the orders.



                  • once he will receive a newly assigned delivery, the Accept screen will be displayed. On this screen, he could see the preview of all orders for this delivery. He needs to decide if he wanted to ACCEPT or DECLINE this delivery. The accepting the delivery is very easy - the courier just needs to hold the white circle in the middle of the bottom screen and depending on his action, move it to chevron_left the left or chevron_right right. For some accounts, the option DECLINE could be hidden. This is because of the set up of the account. In such case, you need to ask the administrator of the account (you need to ask for the access)



                  • if the courier accepts the delivery, this delivery will be listed on the screen List of deliveries. Before he starts this delivery, he could start picking up the meals for these orders under the delivery. For instance, for the order #001, if the courier wants to check, what meals he needs to pick up, he just needs to hold the finger on this row, and the list of meals will be listed.



                  • once the List of meals is displayed, the courier can by clicking on the rows keep the log, what he picked up and what is not. Once he is done with picking up the meals, he could close this dialog by click on the BACK button or by clicking outside the list area.



                  • the courier has also the option to preview the details of the order before he will START THE DELIVERY. He could do that by a single click on the row with the order. Once the courier is done with checking the details of the order, he could close this screen by clicking on arrow_back the BACK ARROW in the top-right corner or by the BACK button.



                  • once the courier wants to START THE DELIVERY, he could do that by holding the white circle in the green label on the bottom side of the block of the delivery. Once the courier holds the circle, he needs to swipe to the right side to START THE DELIVERY. During this starting procedure, the update mechanism will be triggered once again, just to be sure that the courier has the latest updated orders for all assigned deliveries.



                  • the new screen Order on the map will be displayed. On this screen, the courier could use the navigation to reach the customer, call the customer before the arrival, notify him with the SMS/e-mail and skip or cancel the order. Once the courier gets to the location of the customer, he could notify the manager and the rest, that he ARRIVED AT CUSTOMER. He could do that by holding the white circle in the orange label and swiping to the right. Once he will do that, the status of the order will be changed to the FINISHED ORDER



                  • if the customer is not reachable, the traffic jam occurred or there is another reason, why the courier can’t finish the order for the customer, he could skip the order by click on the option redo skip. The new dialog will be shown, where the courier has prepared reasons or he could type his own reason, why he can’t reach the customer. Only the last order in the list of orders for the delivery can’t be skipped, obviously.





                  • when the courier sends the SKIP ORDER reason, the dialog with the list of skipped orders will be listed. It’s up to him if he wanted to GO TO SKIPPED ORDER or to continue with the next order in the list.



                  • once the order was skipped or finished by the courier, the screen will automatically focus on the next order (you could notice that by changing 2/2 position with updated order info and map redrawn). The procedure is the same as for the previous order, ARRIVE > FINISH, etc.



                  • but in some cases, the courier needs to cancel the order because of canceled by customer reason or test order reason. He could do that by clicking on the option cancel cancel. The new dialog will be shown, where the courier has prepared reasons or he could type his own reason, why he needs to cancel the order. For some accounts, the option CANCEL the order could be hidden. This is because of the set up of the account. In such case, you need to ask the administrator of the account (you need to ask for the access)





                  • if the courier needs to check the list of meals for the order, he could do that by clicking on the receipt details option in the bottom bar.



                  • the courier could also start the external navigation application. He could do that by clicking on the navigation arrow icon in the top-right screen or the same icon navigation navigate in the bottom bar. The external application will be started (if it’s installed) and will start the navigation automatically.



                  • once the courier arrived at the customer, he needs to wait until the customer will come for the meals. When he will get the meals, the courier could change the status of the order as finished. He could do that by holding the white circle in the green label and swiping to the right. The status will be changed, and the manager will be notified, that the order was finished by the courier.



                  • if the feature ADD THE TIPS is enabled for the whole account and the order is going to be paid by card, the screen dialog with an option to add a tip from the customer will be displayed. The customer has the option to add the additional tip on the top of the order or no. For some accounts, the option ADD THE TIPS the order could be hidden. This is because of the set up of the account. In such case, you need to ask the administrator of the account (you need to ask for the access)



                  • if the feature ADD THE SIGNATURE is enabled for the whole account and the order is going to be paid by card, after finishing the order, the customer needs to add his signature for verification purposes of handing over the order to the customer. The new screen will be displayed, where the customer signs the order and click on the button SAVE. For some accounts, the option ADD THE SIGNATURE the order could be hidden. This is because of the set up of the account. In such case, you need to ask the administrator of the account (you need to ask for the access)



                  • if the courier finishes all the orders for the delivery (whether officially finished or canceled), the dialog with the short summary will be displayed. The courier needs to click on the RETURN TO STORE button.



                  • the screen List of deliveries will be displayed, and once the courier will get to the store, he needs to click on the I AM THERE button.



                  Description of the “List of restaurants”

                  1. Name of the restaurant
                  2. The direction of the restaurant - depending on the sensor of the device
                  3. The distance of the restaurant - the distance of the object to the courier’s position
                  4. Not in the restaurant - status of the courier, which is on the way, traveling to the store



                  Description of the “Accept/Decline the delivery”

                  1. Delivery ID
                  2. Name of the restaurant
                  3. Order counter
                  4. Partner system ID of the order
                  5. Address of the customer
                  6. Switch to the previous/next order - by clicking on the area or by swiping to the left/right will change the order
                  7. Delivery fee
                  8. Tips - money, which will receive the courier after delivering the order
                  9. Number of orders - how many orders are under the delivery
                  10. Decline of the delivery - option to decline the delivery. Swipe the white circle to the left side
                  11. Accept the delivery - option to accept the delivery. Swipe the white circle to the right side



                  Description of the “List of deliveries”

                  1. Name of the restaurant
                  2. Delivery ID
                  3. Pickup time
                  4. Order counter
                  5. Address of the customer
                  6. Delivery time of the order
                  7. Name of the customer
                  8. Start the delivery - option to start the delivery. Swipe the white circle to the right side



                  Description of the “List of meals”

                  1. Number of picked meals
                  2. Order counter
                  3. Partner system ID of the order
                  4. The total price of the order
                  5. Indicator of picked product
                  6. Name of the product
                  7. Total price for the product
                  8. Quantity of this product
                  9. Price for a single product



                  Description of the “Order on the map”

                  1. Back to the previous screen
                  2. Start the navigation
                  3. Google Map customization
                  4. Address of the customer
                  5. Position of the courier
                  6. Notify the customer through SMS/email
                  7. Call the customer
                  8. Switch for show/hide bottom options
                  9. Position of the order in the list
                  10. Order counter
                  11. Partner system ID of the order
                  12. Address of the customer
                  13. Name of the customer
                  14. Order note
                  15. Payment type
                  16. Total price of the order
                  17. Delivery time of the order
                  18. Skip the order
                  19. Cancel the order
                  20. List of meals
                  21. Start the navigation
